Based on your preferences for genre and actors, I would recommend "Collateral" directed by Christopher Nolan.

The movie follows a successful cab driver who finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

The main actor is Ryan Gosling who delivers an outstanding performance. The movie also features some great supporting actors like Mel Gibson, Jennifer Connelly, and Melissa George. Overall, "Collateral" directed by Christopher Nolan is a must-see movie for anyone who loves suspenseful thrillers with top-notch acting.
